metadata.title: CVE-2016-3732 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The capability check to access other badges in Moodle 3.0 through 3.0.3,2.9 through 2.9.5, 2.8 through 2.8.11, 2.7 through 2.7.13, and earlierallows remote authenticated users to read the badges of other users.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
